title: An Act relative to ensuring the safety of residents of facilities under the authority of the department of developmental services

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Arena-DeRosa of Holliston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 198) of James C. Arena-DeRosa for legislation to authorize video cameras to be installed at entrances, exits, and common areas of certain private facilities under the authority of the Department of Developmental Services.  Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

related_entities.name: committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 09/09/2025 from 1:00 PM-5:00 PM in B-2
Accompanied a study order, see H4883
